attributes.action: ensure that no citizen of the uk should pay more than 20% of their total income to the state in the form of direct or indirect taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: both the level and complexity of the uk tax system are unacceptable in a free society.We believe that the state could exist and provide adequate levels of public service on a fraction of its current budget.People should be free to keep far more of the money they earn and the apparatus of the state should be reduced to the bare minimum.
